meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Pope or the Roman Catholic Church.
meanings.sent1: The papistic ceremony was filled with prayers and incense.
meanings.sent2: The church's papistic decorations included images of saints.
meanings.sent3: The papistic hats worn by the priests made them look like kings.
meanings.sent4: Her papistic devotion to the Pope was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The papistic symbols adorned the walls of the cathedral.

meanings.definition: Someone who adheres to the beliefs or practices of the Pope or the Roman Catholic Church.
meanings.sent1: She was known in the community as a papistic due to her strong faith.
meanings.sent2: The papistic attended mass every Sunday without fail.
meanings.sent3: The little boy jokingly called his friend a papistic for always following the rules.
meanings.sent4: In the debate, he was labeled a papistic for defending traditional values.
meanings.sent5: The papistic's dedication to the church was admirable.
